data.text: @collectivetrout @Hibbletsnbits @DanielNMiller Tbh I feel things are this way bcuz there are those that want to be seen as allies to women so much that they don't care about innocent men. That is what this whole #metoo thing is at it's core
@Hibbletsnbits @DanielNMiller Now, with that, we've found something we agree upon

@CaptThack @DanielNMiller You should believe equally in due process for the women then. confidentiality clauses in sexual harassment and assault cases should be illegal in the interest of public safety. Weinstein is a prime example. He used them as a way to silence and victimize for years.
@Hibbletsnbits @DanielNMiller This all doesn't seem enough for me  to give up the fight for due process. It's a hard truth but not one that I would turn from.

@CaptThack @DanielNMiller Are you aware 1 in 3 women is harassed? Out of those 70% of these incidents are NOT reported! With companies demanding non disclosure agreements, arbitration clauses, courts that disproportionately dismiss the cases that make it there, confidentiality clauses, & you? No wonder.
@Hibbletsnbits @DanielNMiller That also means that she took his money knowing what he was. How could a real victim act that way? That's why ppl weren't sure.
@CaptThack @DanielNMiller He chose instead to settle out of court with Dixon, so to me he deserves no day in court. His payment was his admission of guilt. Period.

@Hibbletsnbits @DanielNMiller I feel this way because I believe it is sad to see a person who is accused, even if guilty, to lose the right to defend themselves. It is an act that all people who are not born into power should respect. To take action without their chance for defence makes us a lunch mob

@Hibbletsnbits @DanielNMiller It was just a question. Besides unless he's tired in court the only reasonable doubt one can rely on is his or her own. That being said, I want to believe a man who strongly denies these kinds of allegations.

@CaptThack @DanielNMiller The same reason I don't believe Trump, Weinstein or Moore. Multiple credible accusers. The question isn't why I don't believe "him" it's why don't YOU believe "them"

But save it. Saw your profile. You're that "here for the chaos guy".. #NoThanks 👋
@Hibbletsnbits @DanielNMiller Well... Why don't u believe him?
